articles.content: A sharing feature built into Apple's latest iOS update has police departments nationwide issuing a warning to iPhone users, but security experts say the hubbub may be a bit hyped up. The new NameDrop… [+1987 chars]

articles.title: Tech News Today: Nothing Phone 2 price slashed permanently, Elon Musk asks advertisers to buzz off - The Indian Express
articles.description: Tech News Today (December 1, 2023): Here's a mix of tech news tidbits to digest on this Friday. Nothing Phone gets a big permanent price cut, Google shares its fave apps, WhatsApp boosts chat privacy, and Elon Musk tells advertisers where to go.
